reviews.text: Charming place! unique terracotta-style interior. cozy place for a wine or two for casual catch ups. Good amount of crowd on a Friday night, will recommend swinging by if you are around the area!

Gem of a bar in the east. Super chill atmosphere and comfortable areas for lounging. Candice the sommelier is stellar, able to make great recommendations from the menu and sometimes of new bottles not yet on the list.

Strolling along a lively stretch of eateries and pubs, I stumbled upon a charming new spot that‚Äôs been around for just two months. If it weren't for the quaint, eye-catching sign, I might have missed it entirely! This cozy little haven is the perfect place to unwind with a glass of wine and soak in the relaxed ambience.

A wonderful wine bar (the best wine bar around Joo Chiat/East Coast for us)! The place feels like your living room, it‚Äôs cosy, warm, welcoming üç∑
They host some activities (painting) as well as some food collaborations and wine tastings from countries all over the world.
Benjamin and his team ensure you always spend a lovely time and every time we leave, we can‚Äôt wait to come back!
Beautiful wine bar ! Good vibes, great selection of wines and champagnes including grower champs. There are also pop up events with good food ! Thank you Ben and Hippo for having us.
